text: Kaskade EO is a organization focused on
helping products and services companies
deploy automate and manage solutions out
in the cloud my name is Michael Nouri
I'm the CEO of Cascadia corporation when
your part and services company you have
to think about how much capacity do I
need and how many customers do i
realistically plan for and if you get
that wrong it either cost you too much
or it cost you a lot of clients in the
process the real value of AWS is the
fact that you can auto scale a lot of
your products along with your customers
and all the tools they provide you with
really allows you to not only deploy it
quicker but also control those cost
elements I think the biggest part of it
is not just from a revenue perspective
but actually the number of clients that
we can help so from our point of view it
has really made our customers a lot more
successful to roll out innovation a lot
faster in ways that they could never do
before so since we got involved with AWS
and became a partner of theirs back in
2012 we really seen in almost a doubling
of our client base what that really
allowed us to do is get access to a lot
of information but I think probably the
biggest thing is that it allows our
resources to go in and become trained
become certified from our perspective we
have seen a trim dramatic increase in
number of clients we can help that we
can help be successful at every
different level
